column9:
Thank you for your email. I will be out of the office until Tuesday 9th
March. If the matter is urgent please phone my mobile - 0408 831 172.

Otherwise I will attend to your email upon my return.

Thank you for your patience.

With Kind Regards.

Bianca Sowik
Business Development & Marketing Manager
